text:
French-speaking/English-speaking R Dev Day at University of Mons, Belgium, 22 May 2025: <https://pretix.eu/r-contributors/r-dev-day-rr2025/>.

Join us for this open, collaborative event for people interested in contributing to the code and documentation of base R, or to infrastructure that supports such contribution. Both new and experienced contributors are welcome!

This is straight after Rencontres R 2025 (<https://rr2025.sciencesconf.org/?lang=fr>), but registration for Rencontres R is not required. Registration for the R Dev Day is free of charge (includes lunch and refreshments!).
